MetricDescription: % systems for which security controls have been tested and evaluated in the past year
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: Average time elapsed between vulnerability or weakness discovery and implementation of corrective actions
Target:
X or lower, 
X % lower than previous period, 
X % reduction over a defined period 

Lower is better
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
